scripts.stop-docker-redis: docker stop redis-test && docker container rm redis-test
scripts.start-docker-mysql: docker run -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_DATABASE="mydb" -e MYSQL_USER="amine" -e MYSQL_PASSWORD="azerty123456." --name=mysql -d mysql/mysql-server
scripts.stop-docker-mysql: docker stop mysql && docker container rm mysql
